name: remote-testing-tools
description: Local Action Server - A lightweight, extensible server for triggering local command-line actions

scripts.generate:swift-client: yarn workspace server openapi:generate && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i packages/server/openapi.json -g swift5 -o packages/swift-client --additional-properties=projectName=RemoteTestToolsClient,responseAs=Async,swiftVersion=5.10
